subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: James Neal had a hat trick and the Penguins finished off the lifeless Senators in Game 5 of the Eastern Conference semifinals to take the best-of-seven series, 4-1.
snippet: James Neal had a hat trick and the Penguins finished off the lifeless Senators in Game 5 of the Eastern Conference semifinals to take the best-of-seven series, 4-1.
